entry.title: Crypto-Incentivized Mobile Networks Gain Traction
entry.summary: Companies like Helium and Pollen seek to disrupt the telecom industry with crypto-incentivized mobile networks.

entry.title: Osmosis Exploited For $5M Due To Contract Bug
entry.summary: Four attackers were responsible for stealing at least 95% of the money. Two have already said they will return the money they had stolen, according to co-founder Sunny Aggarwal.

entry.title: Market Maker Mishap Leads to Loss of 20M OP Tokens
entry.summary: 20M OP tokens that were loaned to market maker Wintermute have been stolen by parties unknown.

entry.title: BREAKING: Ethereumâ€™s Ropsten Testnet Merge Is Complete
entry.summary: On June 8, the public Ropsten testnet transitioned from Proof-of-Work consensus to Proof-of-Stake.

entry.title: Liquid Staking Providers Buck Bear Market With Hefty Inflows
entry.summary: Data Shows $2.3B Flow Into Lido as Other Protocols Suffer Withdrawals
